pages.text: Each time a $(thing)Bee$() enters a nest or hive covered in pollen, it starts converting it to $(item)Honey$() and $(item)Honeycomb$(). $(br2)Once it's full, it changes its appearance to show honey oozing out. $(br2)To harvest $(item)Honey$(), the $(thing)Player$() uses a $(item)Glass Bottle$() on the hive. $(br)To harvest $(item)Honeycomb$(), the $(thing)Player$() uses $(item)Shears$() on the nest or hive.
